update.description:
This PRs implements the support for colcon \+ vcpkg in our CI scripts. The first example implemented here is ign-physics:

* DSL: there are limitations about length in paths on Windows batch so the names should be as small as possible \(this needs to be migrated to powershell or other alternative at some point\).

Test run in DSL:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/\_dsl\_ignition/556/

Tets run of physics:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_physics-ci-win&build=10)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-ci-win/10/)** **https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_physics-ci-win/10/console

‌

‌

pullrequest.title: Implement colcon builds support on Windows: ign-physics

content.raw: that is right, an undesirable effect of not having isolation on the base system. We can implement the whole removal of all packages installed by vcpkg before running the scripts \(similar that we do in brew\) although we need to pay the cost of installing/compiling them again.
content.html: that is right, an undesirable effect of not having isolation on the base system. We can implement the whole removal of all packages installed by vcpkg before running the scripts (similar that we do in brew) although we need to pay the cost of installing/compiling them again.

pullrequest.title: Implement colcon builds support on Windows: ign-physics

content.raw: Our internal dependencies are \(by now\) handled in the rosdistro file \(ign-cmake, ign-math5 and ign-common2\). The external dependencies are handled at [#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/598/implement-colcon-builds-support-on-windows/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/lib/colcon-default-devel-windows.batT77](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/598/implement-colcon-builds-support-on-windows/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/lib/colcon-default-devel-windows.batT77) using vcpkg although we don’t have any for ign-physics.
content.html: Our internal dependencies are (by now) handled in the rosdistro file (ign-cmake, ign-math5 and ign-common2). The external dependencies are handled at #!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/598/implement-colcon-builds-support-on-windows/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/lib/colcon-default-devel-windows.batT77 using vcpkg although we don’t have any for ign-physics.
